name: CircularFifoQueue_addTest
description: Unit tests for the add functionality of the CircularFifoQueue class.

test_cases.name: testAddElementSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful addition of an element to the CircularFifoQueue.

test_cases.name: testAddElementNull
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when attempting to add a null element to the CircularFifoQueue.

test_cases.name: testAddElementAtFullCapacity
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of adding an element when the CircularFifoQueue is at full capacity.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWrapAround
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of adding an element when the CircularFifoQueue wraps around.

test_cases.name: testAddElementAfterClear
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of adding an element after clearing the CircularFifoQueue.

test_cases.name: testAddElementAfterRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of adding an element after removing an element from the CircularFifoQueue.
